steps.label: Enter Stage
steps.description: Influencers enter the stage when their *Initial Incentive* is set to *Fulfilled*

steps.label: Waiting for Post
steps.description: Influencerâ€™s status is set to _Waiting for Post_

steps.label: Product Sent + Posting Instructions
steps.description: Email _Product Sent + Posting Instructions_ is sent *Automatically*

steps.label: Post Reminder 1
steps.description: Email _Post Reminder 1_ is sent *Automatically* 5 days _before_ the *Content Due Date* when an influencer's status is _Waiting for Post_

steps.label: Post Reminder 2
steps.description: Email _Post Reminder 2_ is sent *Automatically* 1 days _before_ the *Content Due Date* when an influencer's status is _Waiting for Post_

steps.label: Post Reminder 3
steps.description: Email _Post Reminder 3_ is sent *Automatically* 1 days _after_ the *Content Due Date* when an influencer's status is _Waiting for Post_

steps.label: Exit Stage
steps.description: Influencers exist stage when they complete the *Post Requirements*
